data.value: From time to time we’d like to contact your business about products and services you might find useful.
How would you like to be contacted?

children.label: What is your business mailing address?

data.tooltip: We'll be sending important items, such as your debit card, to this address so please make sure it's secure and not accessible by the public.

validation.message: Please try again, this email address doesn't seem right

data.value: We want to learn as much about you and your business as we can. This will help us quickly set up your account and, long-term, give you the best advice. There are also some questions we're required to ask in order to comply with UK anti-money-laundering regulations.

children.tooltip: A trade name is often a simpler, public-facing name used by your business, such as a shop name or website. We only need to know about it if you’ll be accepting payments under your trade name.

children.label: Explain here why this is different to xzxzxz [EXAMPLE: I own two shops and an ecommerce platform which trade under the name 'Blue Banana' as part of the registered business 'Impossible Fruit Ltd'.]
What type of premises is your trading address?
Please provide a description of your trading premises

children.tooltip: This includes anywhere owned or rented by your business, including shared premises, shops and warehouses.

data.value: How many premises, offices and outlets do you have in total?

validation.value: You need to have at least one
validation.message: You need to have at least one

children.label: Does your business have premises abroad?
Do you have premises in any of these countries?

children.tooltip: A beneficial owner has effective ownership of a business without actually being registered to it.
children.label: Do you have a parent company, headquarters or beneficial owner?

children.tooltip: If this relates to a beneficial owner, please select where they live for most of the year.

data.value: Where is the parent company, headquarters or beneficial owner based?

children.tooltip: We ask this because the country of incorporation could be different to the trading country.

data.value: Where is the parent company, headquarters or beneficial owner incorporated?

children.label: Will this account be used in the running of a Church or Religious Body?
What is your country of incorporation/establishment?
Are you registered for tax outside the UK?
